properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 529 NW 23rd Ave, Portland, ORElection coverage on TV and all-night happy hour.

properties.name: Ace Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1022 SW Stark St. PortlandThe Ace Hotel will have election returns.

properties.name: Anna Bannana's Cafe & Bar
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 8716 N Lombard St, Portland, OR 97302Yes, it\'s a bar, but the debate-watching party is open to all ages.

properties.name: Bagdad Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 3702 SE Hawthorne Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5146McMenamins and CBS/KOIN Local 6 present…ELECTION NIGHT 2008 Doors at 5 p.m | Free | 21 & over

properties.name: Barackspace Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek   115 NW 5th Portland, OR For one-night only, Backspace Cafe becomes BarackSpace, your kid-friendly election night headquarters. The Free event is hosted by Activistas, Poligots, Momocrats and will feature Election Map Coloring, Pin the Tail on the on the Dem Donkey and many other games for parents and children. Plus, it\'s free.

properties.name: Basta's Italian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 410 NW 21st Ave, Portland, ORElection coverage streaming on the big scree. Free Pizza Bianca and Happy Hour all night long.

properties.name: Blitz Bar
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 110 NW 10th Ave, Portland, OR 97209

properties.name: Bluehour
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 250 NW 13th Ave, Portland, ORWatch the election on the bar\'s TVs and enjoy happy hour all night long.

properties.name: Campaign for Change Beaverton Headquarters
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 14025 SW Farmington Rd, Beaverton, OR 97005Cheer on Obama with his most devoted fans at this debate watch party, organized by Barack Obama\'s Campaign for Change.

properties.name: Carlino's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 21817 NE Halsey St., Fairwiew, OR 97024Tune into the debate and grab a slice with your East County neighbors.

properties.name: Clarklewis
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1001 SE Water Avenue, Portland, ORAll-night happy hour and election coverage.

properties.name: Doug Fir Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek   830 E. Burnside Portland, OR 97214Food, drinks, games and scantily-clad women plus analysis from Steve Novick and music from DJs Gregarious and Flightrisk. Mayor Sam Adams is also expected to make a cameo. Sponsored by the Portland Mercury.

properties.name: Grand Central Bowl
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek  808 SE Morrison St., Portland, ORIt\'s the Willamette Week Election Night Party with the Bus Project! Cocktails, food, raffles, live music and cheap bowling, plus the best in election coverage.

properties.name: Juliano's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 15606 SE Mill Plain Blvd, Vancouver, WA 98684Enjoy your squabbles over flag pins with sides of beer and pizza.

properties.name: Kell's Irish Restaurant & Pub
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 112 SW Second Avenue, Portland ORHey, just because it\'s an Irish pub doesn\'t mean they can\'t have an American Election Night.

properties.name: Kells Irish Restaurant & Pub
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 112 SW 2nd Ave, Portland, OR 97204Catch O\'Bama on the big screen at this Irish pub.

properties.name: Laurelhurst Theater
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 2735 East Burnside, Portland, OR 97214Watch the debate on the silver screen. Be sure to get there early because it\'s first come, first served. Free admission. 21+ only.

properties.name: Living Room Theatres
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 341 SW Tenth Avenue, Portland, OR 97205Sink into one of the theater\'s couches and watch the first debate live on the big screen. Admission is free, but it\'s recommended that you call to reserve a seat: 971-222-2005.

properties.name: Macadams Bar and Grill
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 5833 SW Macadam Avenue, Portland, OR 97239Debate watchers will enjoy the luxury of a separate room at this burgers-plus joint.

properties.name: McMenamins Mission Theater
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1624 NW Glisan, Portland, ORElection coverage with burgers and brews.

properties.name: Olea
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1338 Nw Hoyt St, Portland, ORPreparing for the impending depression? Sharpen your soup kitchen skillz at Olea, where they\'re offering a free bowl of soup to folks who go there to watch the election coverage.

properties.name: Oregon Association of Minority Entrepreneurs
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 4134 N. Vancouver Ave, Portland, OR 97217This get-together, one of two official Portland watch parties organized by Barack Obama\'s Campaign for Change, will be held at the Oregon Association of Minority Entrepreneurs office.

properties.name: Pizza Schmizza - Hillsboro Airport
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 891 NE 25th Ave, Hillsboro, OR 97124Coverage will be on TV all day but the official "event" will begin at 5PM. We have three TV\'s as will be monitoring three different channels. All large, XL and Classic one topping pizzas will be off of the regular price. Identify yourself as a Democrat and receive pint beers (21 & Over) from Off the Rail Brewery in Forest Grove.

properties.name: Redwing Coffee and Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek  1700 SE 6th Ave Portland ORPortland Metro Pacific Green Party is hosting an election night party at a Redwing Coffee and Bakery, a worker owned restaurant in inner southeast Portland at the corner of SE 6th and Market. Come down and meet the candidates and watch election results on Redwing’s big screen TV.

properties.name: Robin's House
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 10278 SW Todd Court, Portland, OR 97225Please call to RSVP if you plan on showing up: 503 297 8931. And bring snacks to share.

properties.name: Robyn's House
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 7929 SE Clay St., Portland, OR 97215This debate-watching party is also potluck, so whip up a dish and bring it along. The hosts will also be matching donations made to the Obama campaign up to 50.

properties.name: Saucebox
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 214 Sw Broadway, Portland, OREnjoy the all-night happy hour as you watch the results come in.

properties.name: Sharon's House
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 5123 SE Salmon St., Portland, OR 97215The party will be kicking off at 5 p.m., one hour before the debates start.

properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek 1201 SW Jefferson PortlandHappy hour all night long.

properties.name: aura Restaurant + Lounge
